mapper.select: select state from tb_student where sid=#{sid} and spwd=#{spwd}
mapper.update: update state=1 from tb_student where sid=#{sid}
mapper.select: select * from tb_student stu,tb_class cla,tb_authority auth where stu.classId=cla.classId and stu.authorId=auth.authorId and sid=#{sid}
mapper.update: update spwd=#{spwd} from tb_student where sid=#{sid}
mapper.select: select distinct courseName,score,tname from tb_score core,tb_course course,tb_teacher tea where core.courseId=course.courseId and course.courseId=tea.courseId and sid=#{sid}
